Package com.veeva.application.stepDefinition

Class NBAWarriorsHomePageStepDefinition

java.lang.Object
com.veeva.generic.keywords.GenericKeywords
com.veeva.application.stepDefinition.NBAWarriorsHomePageStepDefinition
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.veeva.generic.keywords.NonSeleniumKeywords, com.veeva.generic.keywords.SeleniumKeywords
public class NBAWarriorsHomePageStepDefinition extends com.veeva.generic.keywords.GenericKeywords
Step definitions for scenarios dealing with the NBA Warriors Home page. This class defines steps for various actions like opening URLs, accepting cookies, navigating to specific sections, and handling post-scenario activities.

  • Method Details

    • after

      public void after(io.cucumber.java.Scenario scenario)
      Executes actions after each scenario. Updates the test status in the report and closes browsers.
      Parameters:
      scenario - The current Cucumber scenario being executed.

    • loadNBAURL

      @Given("Open {string} and load {string} URL") public void loadNBAURL(String browser, String productName)
      Opens a specified browser and loads a designated URL. URLs are determined based on the provided product name.
      Parameters:
      browser - The name of the browser to open.
      productName - The name of the product to determine which URL to load.

    • loadNBAURL

      @Given("Open {string}") public void loadNBAURL(String browser) throws InterruptedException
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • pageIsLoaded

      @When("Page is Loaded") public void pageIsLoaded()
      Ensures the page is fully loaded by performing necessary actions like accepting cookies.

    • navigateToCategoryShopNow

      @Then("Navigate to {string} shop now") public void navigateToCategoryShopNow(String category)
      Navigates to a specific category's shop page.
      Parameters:
      category - The category to navigate to.

    • navigateToMenuAndToNewsAndFeatures

      @Then("Navigate to menu and to {string}") public void navigateToMenuAndToNewsAndFeatures(String menu)
      Navigates to a specific menu item, such as 'News and Features', on the NBA Warriors Home page.
      Parameters:
      menu - The menu item to navigate to.
